This command lets you join any Twitch chat channel.
You do not need to use this command to join your own channel as long as itâ€™s linked to your LioranBoard, as it will join the chat automatically as soon as you launch Transmitter.

Use this command to join any alternate accounts you have linked to LioranBoard and wish to listen to the chat traffic on.
Box Name Type Description
Channel Name String Twitch channel name. Must be the login name, not display name.

Button which auto connects to your alternate account

Import JSON button
